attributes.action: allow gerkhas who have joined the british army to be allowed to live in britain as a british citizen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these brave gerkhas have fought for britain for over 200 years, fighting for britain yet they are not allowed to stay in britain when they lleave the british army. the goverment would rather have murderers, rapists and other criminals from other countrys than the people who fight and die for the british people. one gerkha soldier gave his life to save my grandads during ww2 so i say let them stay.

rejection.details: Thank you heowever there is an overlapping petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gurkhas-rights/ Please consider signing this before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
